articles.title: Cheetos food dye turns mice transparent — and scientists say there’s a simple explanation - New York Post
articles.description: This is no puff piece.
articles.content:
This is no puff piece.
Researchers have uncovered the fact that a popular food dye used in Cheetos can turn mice’s skin completely transparent making their organs visible.
Tartrazine, the yellowing… [+1690 chars]
